content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Storm the castle and become a pinball wizard with the Zen Studios CastleStorm Super Bundle, available now for a limited time! The bundle includes CastleStorm – Complete Edition as well as the all-new Iron & Steel Pack for Zen Pinball 2 – which features two brand new pinball tables, Wild West Rampage and CastleStorm Pinball – all for one low price!

CastleStorm

1 Player
Network Players 2 - 2
Minimum Save Size: 1024 KB
Network Features
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks

Zen Pinball 2

1 - 4 Players
Network Players 2 - 4
Minimum Save Size: 512 KB
Network Features
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Rear Touch Pad
Microphone

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

'CastleStorm', 'CastleStorm Complete Edition', 'Zen Pinball' and 'Zen Pinball 2' are trademarks of Zen Studios Ltd. © 2008-2015 Zen Studios Ltd. All Rights Reserved
